Uses of Interface
org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowOperationHandler

  • Uses of WorkflowOperationHandler in org.opencastproject.workflow.api

    Subinterfaces of WorkflowOperationHandler in org.opencastproject.workflow.api
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    ResumableWorkflowOperationHandler
    A WorkflowOperationHandler that is allowed to return Action.PAUSE to pause (and later resume) a workflow.
    Classes in org.opencastproject.workflow.api that implement WorkflowOperationHandler
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractWorkflowOperationHandler
    Abstract base implementation for an operation handler, which implements a simple start operation that returns a WorkflowOperationResult with the current mediapackage and WorkflowOperationResult.Action.CONTINUE.
